name: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
description: Moviestar Nick Cage is channeling his iconic characters as he's caught between a superfan and a CIA agent.

review.author: dahhmlife
review.heading: Cheesy in the best way.
review.reviewBody: Very cheesy, but self aware. It was good to laugh at the movies again. Pedro Pascal and Nick Cage somehow made magic together. An unlikely but very effective duo. Even the action scenes were well done. Awesome cast and stunning location. A hilarious and fun ride.

keywords: spain,american in spain,american abroad,golden gun,kidnapped girl
